thread.title: A Puppy Got Stuck Down A Well And A Whole Country Joined Together To Save It
thread.title_full: A Puppy Got Stuck Down A Well And A Whole Country Joined Together To Save It

author: Rachael Krishna
title: A Puppy Got Stuck Down A Well And A Whole Country Joined Together To Save It
text:
“Let’s support this tag. There’s a puppy who’s been waiting 11 days to be rescued.” ID: 10542632 8. After ten days with no luck, hope came when Energy Minister Berat Albayrak intervened and sent a rescue crew from the Turkish Coal Institute. The expanded rescue team then planned to lower a lasso down the hole to grab Kuyu. @seec hayır Buradayız
— Barış ŞENGÜN (@MBarisSengun) ID: 10542693 9. After a couple of tries, the dog was successfully rescued from the well on Wednesday morning. People were pretty damn happy. günlerdir emek veren herkesten allah razı olsun. bu güzel anlara tanıklık etmek bize nasip oldu. direndi, kazandık!… https://t.co/o5gJaXtS9k
— Mert Efe (@mertefesi) ID: 10542700 #DirenKuyu
— Barış ŞENGÜN (@MBarisSengun) ID: 10542836 11. The puppy was taken to a vet to get checked over. #direnkuyu Şükür 😍🙏
— Güllü Yüksek (@yuksek_gullu) ID: 10542823 12. The local fire station, who helped in the rescue, announced shortly after that they have adopted Kuyu. The puppy and its new owners have since appeared on TV and posed for photos. @sucicegi
— Barış ŞENGÜN (@MBarisSengun) ID: 10542848 13. Orhan Kural, an animal rights campaigner and mining engineering professor, told Anadolu Agency that the dog’s rescue was the result of “extraordinary, professional work”. Finally an opinion I want to hear #kuyu #direnkuyu
— Doğucan Yıldırım (@orenthil) ID: 10542887 14. After the rescue, the hashtags were flooded with adorable pictures of the rescued Kuya. Oh be😌😍 #direnkuyu
— QueenOfNekos (@AnimeciKedicik) ID: 10542936 15. Way to go, Kuyu! After medical examinations he was adopted by the Istanbul Beykoz Fire Crew. #faithinhumanityrestored 😭😭😭❤️❤️❤️🙏🏻🙏🏻… https://t.co/zb2AB8KChw
— Berna Kösem (@dasbernd_) ID: 10543023
